title: Noam Chomsky - 2006-12-01 - Kicking Away the Ladder - Talk with Q&A   Boston, MA -  Improved sound
description:
Be sure to pick at least 720p for best sound quality.
On December 1, 2006, Noam Chomsky spoke to City Life/Vida Urbana - a Boston-based social justice group - on the subject "Kicking Away the Ladder" in which he discusses economic matters.  Q&A follows the talk.

The source file is an old MP3 I've had on various hard drives for almost 20 years.  I gave it the usual digital noise reduction and EQing, improving it quite a bit.  The lecture section (the first 59 minutes or so) suffered from severe clipping, so it was necessary to roll of much of the treble. I also removed several strange audio flubs and leveled out the sound.  




Tags:
